idea-plugin.name: Base16 Shapeshifter
idea-plugin.vendor: Tyler Benziger (http://tybenz.com), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Shapeshifter for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Tyler Benziger (http://tybenz.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
